Opinion: More holey than righteous, tastes of vinegar
Slices are flatter than a pancake. Dry. Luckily a favourite of cafes, so you know the order is correct
Not worth the money, expires quickly
Worth the money, but you can only afford to eat one slice of bread with your sandwich
Always dry, always tastes of mould, and all are so thinly sliced that a slice of ham is thicker
